actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Governmental Affairs (without written report).
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to authorize a staff investigator of the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations to present himself and be deposed and to present himself and give testimony at the trial in the matter of Janine Perrigon, et al. v.  Bergin Brunswig Corporation, et al.

summary.text: Authorizes Senate staff member David Vienna to give trial testimony in a specified civil case with regard to certain Senate medicaid management hearings.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize a staff investigator of the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations to present himself and be deposed and to present himself and give testimony at the trial in the matter of Janine Perrigon, et al. v.  Bergin Brunswig Corporation, et al.
